changeSet.sql: UPDATE ais_consent a SET tpp_info_id = (SELECT n.new_tpp_info_id FROM tpp_info t INNER JOIN (SELECT MIN(tpp_info_id) AS new_tpp_info_id, authorisation_number FROM tpp_info GROUP BY authorisation_number) n ON t.authorisation_number = n.authorisation_number WHERE a.tpp_info_id = t.tpp_info_id);

UPDATE pis_common_payment p SET tpp_info_id = (SELECT n.new_tpp_info_id FROM tpp_info t INNER JOIN (SELECT MIN(tpp_info_id) AS new_tpp_info_id, authorisation_number FROM tpp_info GROUP BY authorisation_number) n ON t.authorisation_number = n.authorisation_number WHERE p.tpp_info_id = t.tpp_info_id);

UPDATE piis_consent p SET tpp_info_id = (SELECT n.new_tpp_info_id FROM tpp_info t INNER JOIN (SELECT MIN(tpp_info_id) AS new_tpp_info_id, authorisation_number FROM tpp_info GROUP BY authorisation_number) n ON t.authorisation_number = n.authorisation_number WHERE p.tpp_info_id = t.tpp_info_id);
DELETE FROM tpp_info_role WHERE tpp_info_id IN (SELECT i.tpp_info_id FROM tpp_info i WHERE i.tpp_info_id NOT IN (SELECT MIN(tpp_info_id) AS tpp_info_id FROM tpp_info GROUP BY authorisation_number))
DELETE FROM tpp_info WHERE tpp_info_id NOT IN (SELECT MIN(tpp_info_id) AS tpp_info_id FROM tpp_info GROUP BY authorisation_number)
UPDATE tpp_info SET redirect_uri = NULL, nok_redirect_uri = NULL, cancel_redirect_uri = NULL, cancel_nok_redirect_uri = NULL
